casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Cruz MARTINEZ, Jr., Defendant-Petitioner. C-614 September Term 2017
080013 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 09, 2018 *1273To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000395-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
